name: Better Homes and Gardens Deer Stripe Fabric Shower Curtain

reviews.name: Better Homes and Gardens Deer Stripe Fabric Shower Curtain
reviews.reviewText: This is a very pretty shower curtain. It is a gift for a home that is furnished like a fishing and hunting cabin, but in great taste. This will fit perfectly.
reviews.title: Perfect Christmas Gift

reviews.name: Better Homes and Gardens Deer Stripe Fabric Shower Curtain
reviews.reviewText: This is such a cute shower curtain for our condo in VT. Great price and quality.
reviews.title: Great shower curtain in Vermont

reviews.name: Better Homes and Gardens Deer Stripe Fabric Shower Curtain
reviews.reviewText: I used this as a curtain for a closet that has no door. It's perfect. The material is thick and dark
reviews.title: really nice
